channel.title: Security on Ray's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Ray's Blog

item.title: Security Open Source
item.description: List of cool open source tools and projects I have come across. Open source tools and projects Brakeman Scanner: Able to detect vulnerabilities on the latest Ruby on Rails version. https://brakemanscanner.org OWASP Dependency-Check: Able to detect vulnerabilities in project’s depedencies. https://dependencytrack.org InfoSec-jobs.com security specific job website created with open source tools. https://infosec-jobs.com
